descrp: Development of 3-dimensional visualization skills for engineering design.  Sketching as a tool for design communication.  Presentation of 3-dimensional geometry with 2-dimensional engineering drawings.  This course will introduce the use of 2-dimensional CAD on computer workstations as a major graphical analysis and design tool.  A group design project is required.  Teamwork and effective communication are emphasized.
name: Visualization for Design
